hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Abdullah bin Yazid Al-Khatmi said:"Umar bin Al-Khattab, may Allah be pleased with him, wrote to us (saying): 'Cook your drinks until the share of the Shaitan is gone, for he has two (shares) and you have one

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرِ مَا يَجُوزُ شُرْبُهُ مِنَ الطِّلاَءِ وَمَا لاَ يَجُوزُ
chapter.eng-name: What Kind of Thickened Grape Juice is Permissible to Drink and What Kind is Not Permitte
